import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FEATURED_PROJECTS } from '../projects'; @Component({ selector: 'app-featured-projects', templateUrl: './featured-projects.component.html', styleUrls: ['./featured-projects.component.css'] }) export class FeaturedProjectsComponent { projects = FEATURED_PROJECTS; buttons = ["ANGULAR", "BOOTSTRAP","TYPESCRIPT","DESIGN"] }

{{project.title | uppercase}}

  • {{item}}

{{project.summary}}

PROBLEM

{{project.problem}}

SOLUTION

{{project.solution}}

NOTABLE FEATURES

{{project.features}}
